snippet.title: APICO Butterfly Update Flutters to Console!
snippet.description:
APICO version 2.0,  I Can’t Bee-lieve it’s Not Butter(flies)!, buzzes onto PlayStaion and Nintendo Switch May 11. 

This update brings new NPCs – research partners Codey and Sto from the Mainland – solitary bees, new flowers, more books, new music, and of course, butterflies! 

To stay up to date on all things Whitethorn, you can follow our socials!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/whitethorngames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/whitethorngames
APICO Twitter: https://twitter.com/apico_game
